title: Best in town
text: We were looking for another cafe but we stopped by here by mistake. But this was the best mistake on our visit to Istanbul. That doner kebab and the orange juice was fantastic, absolutely fantastic! We were lucky to find this place. Working guys got their mask on, they were keeping the social distance and most importantly they were very nice. We had our second shock when we saw the prices because the prices was really reasonable. This place is very good for a quick lunch.

title: Spice Town!
text: We came to Istanbul with two luggages but thanks to my girlfriend's addiction authentic flavours we are gonna need another luggage. She bought everything she saw! Can't wait to taste her delicious foods with all these spices. It was not as crowded as we have seen on the videos due to pandemic so it was nice to wander around in these stunning building.

title: Great Place
text: This is place was really far away from where we stay but my fiancée really wanted to see that once she heard the story of this place. Absolutely amazing structure. The weather was cold but we got tea and enjoyed the landscape.

title: Mesmerized
text: History..just history. You can't help feeling mesmerized. I wonder how living in this place on that era would be. Great view!
